items.sentence: I\'ve already told Tom not to do that again.
Tom\'s behavior never ceases to surprise me.
Tom\'s body was found along a deserted road.
Tom\'s flight was postponed for three hours.
Tom\'s girlfriend saw him with another girl.
Tom\'s great-great-grandfather was a pirate.
Can we go to the lake and watch the sunrise?
Can you remember how much you paid for this?
Can you remember the first time you saw Tom?
Can you spin a basketball on your fingertip?
Can you tell me why Tom came back to Boston?
I wonder why they left my name off the list.
I worked with Tom for three years in Boston.
Tom hopefully won\'t have any more problems.
You\'re going to have to leave, aren\'t you?
You\'re going to need one, too, aren\'t you?
Tom spends very little time with his family.
Tom thanked Mary for taking care of his dog.
Tom thought that Mary would never leave him.
If I were you, I\'d listen to Tom\'s advice.
